benchmark_details.name: IHEval
benchmark_details.overview: IHEval is a novel benchmark comprising 3,538 examples across nine tasks, designed to evaluate models' ability to follow the instruction hierarchy while handling cases where instructions may align or conflict.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate language models' ability to follow the instruction hierarchy and identify their weaknesses in handling conflicting instructions.

data.source: Internally created dataset with examples derived from public benchmarks and expert reviews.
data.annotation: Manually reviewed by experts to ensure data quality and coherence.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the models' output adherence to the instruction hierarchy.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to the instruction hierarchy, while significant drops signal difficulty managing instruction conflicts.
methodology.validation: Programmatic evaluation ensuring efficient and reproducible results.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data sourced from public benchmarks and reviewed to avoid sensitive information.
